analysis.description:
ANY.startDate (/unique_chucks/16/0xdf1b1b23f34de198a6881880b345419b59ca38d0.sol#101-102) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xdf1b1b23f34de198a6881880b345419b59ca38d0.sol#209-222)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0xdf1b1b23f34de198a6881880b345419b59ca38d0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/16/0xdf1b1b23f34de198a6881880b345419b59ca38d0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xdf1b1b23f34de198a6881880b345419b59ca38d0.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
